---
title: "aMeta Workshop at Mersin"
date: "31 January 2023"
---

In this webpage, we aim to present a tutorail for our tool aMeta, a workflow to analyse the microbial content in ancient specimens from wide variety of source organisms (including humans).

Please find our preprint through this [link](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.10.03.510579v1).

Please find the whole pipline through this [github repo](https://github.com/NBISweden/aMeta)
